jd: From: Abhay, STM Consulting, Inc. abhay.yadav@consultstm.com Reply to: abhay.yadav@consultstm.com Position: .Net DeveloperLocation: Lakewood, CO 80215 (Hybrid -Able to commute to the Denver Metro area)Duration: 12 Months - Contract to Hire.
